context: Hi, I'm looking for a good Adventure movie to watch with my boyfriend. I liked Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984) Do you know of any good ones?
How about a horror movie Frozen (2010)
Lol, I see what you did there. I've seen that one, and thought it was cute. lol
entity: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
resp: No, that's the other Frozen (2013) you're thinking about. My Frozen (2010) is about a couple stuck on a ski lift. One is eaten by a wolf! Honest

context.content: "Psycho (1960)" is a masterpiece directed by Alfred Hitchcock. It delves into the emotional turmoil of its characters, particularly the complex psychology of the main character, Norman Bates. The movie also weaves a captivating mystery as the audience unravels the secrets of the Bates Motel and the unsettling events that unfold.

Wow, "Psycho (1960)" sounds really intriguing! I love the idea of delving into the emotional turmoil of the characters and uncovering the mysteries. I'm definitely adding it to my watchlist. Thanks for the recommendation! [END]
context.feelings: I'm pleasantly surprised by the recommendation. "Psycho (1960)" seems to have the emotional depth and mystery I enjoy in a movie. The recommender did a great job understanding my preferences. I'm excited to watch it.
